title: Eval Anywhere Eval
description: A JSON schema for eval.yaml files. See https://github.com/sjones6/eval-anywhere for more information

check.description: An eval check to perform on the response.

model.description: the model to use for this check. If not supplied, falls back to the model used for the prompt.

forbidden.description: a list of words or phrases that must not appear. Uses case-insensitive matching to determine if they're used. If omitted, a English language profanity check is performed.

anyOf.description: Check if returned value is roughtly aligned.

model.description: the model to use for this check. If not supplied, falls back to the model used for the prompt.

instructions.description: Instructions to give an LLM to determine if the task has been performed adequately.

anyOf.description: Check if returned value is an exact match.

value.description: The exact match to check against.

case_insensitive.description: Whether to perform the match in a case insensitive way.

anyOf.description: Check if returned value is an exact match.

id.description: the ID of the custom check.

model.description: the model to use for this check. If not supplied, falls back to the model used for the prompt.
The default model to use with this prompt. Ultimately, the target runtime will choose a supported prompt.

checks.description: a list of checks to perform on every eval

evals.description: A list of evals to run

messages.description: An array of messages to include run with the prompt.
